title: Awesome script logotype. Is it a Font or hand drawn?
content:
Help me out here. Need to get this font for a client...loving this right now.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140913005340im_/http:/typophile.com/files/blog-2_5590.jpeg)
author: AEO

comments.content:
Can't state if it's a custom lettering or not but starting from [Brasserie](http://web.archive.org/web/20140913005340/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/wilton/brasserie) would be not so hard I guess.  
More similars: [Matinee Idol](http://web.archive.org/web/20140913005340/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/matinee-idol), [So Prolix](http://web.archive.org/web/20140913005340/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/so-prolix), [Send Flowers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140913005340/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typesetit/send-flowers), [Inessa](http://web.archive.org/web/20140913005340/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/maccampus/inessa)
